SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302a1
Package com.example.cab302a1.result

Class QuizResultService

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302a1.result.QuizResultService
public class QuizResultService extends Object
Service class for handling quiz result operations with database integration. This class provides methods to fetch quiz results from the database using the AttemptDao.getScore() method and related data from other DAOs.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CAB302 Assignment Team

  • Constructor Details

    • QuizResultService

      public QuizResultService(com.example.cab302a1.dao.AttemptDao attemptDao, com.example.cab302a1.dao.QuizDao quizDao, com.example.cab302a1.dao.UserDao userDao, com.example.cab302a1.dao.QuestionDao questionDao)
      Constructor with dependency injection for DAO objects.
      Parameters:
      attemptDao - DAO for quiz attempt operations
      quizDao - DAO for quiz operations
      userDao - DAO for user operations
      questionDao - DAO for question operations

    • QuizResultService

      public QuizResultService()
      Default constructor using new DAO instances. Convenient for quick usage without dependency injection.

  • Method Details

    • getQuizResult

      public QuizResultData getQuizResult(int quizId, int userId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Creates QuizResultData using the database score for a specific quiz and user. This method uses AttemptDao.getScore() to fetch the actual score from the database.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      QuizResultData object with database score, or null if not found
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if there's an error fetching data

    • getQuizResultForCurrentUser

      public QuizResultData getQuizResultForCurrentUser(int quizId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Creates QuizResultData for the currently logged-in user. Uses Session.getCurrentUser() to get the current user ID.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      QuizResultData object with database score
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if no user is logged in or data cannot be fetched

    • hasQuizResult

      public boolean hasQuizResult(int quizId, int userId)
      Checks if a quiz result exists for the given quiz and user.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if a result exists, false otherwise

    • hasQuizResultForCurrentUser

      public boolean hasQuizResultForCurrentUser(int quizId)
      Checks if a quiz result exists for the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      true if a result exists, false otherwise

    • createFromDatabase

      public static QuizResultData createFromDatabase(int quizId, int userId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Factory method for easy integration by team members. Creates a QuizResultData object from database for immediate use.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      QuizResultData ready for display
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if data cannot be fetched

    • createForCurrentUser

      public static QuizResultData createForCurrentUser(int quizId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Factory method for current user. Creates a QuizResultData object from database for the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      QuizResultData ready for display
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if data cannot be fetched
